question.questionText: Jim used a solid and water to make Mixtures one (one spoon of solid in 100 milliliters water was clear with nothing on the bottom), 3 (3 spoons of solid in 100 milliliters water was clear with nothing on the bottom), 4 (4 spoons of solid in 100 milliliters water was clear with material on the bottom), and 5 (5 spoons of solid in 100 milliliters water was clear with material on the bottom) as shown below. He stirred each one and observed the results. Which solution(s) is saturated? What is the evidence of saturation?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: Mixtures 4 and 5 are saturated. There is material on the bottom of 4 and 5.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: Mixture 4 and 5 because it has the precipitate at the bottom of the cup.
4 and 5 because you see material on bottom.
The ones that are saturated are mixtures 4, 5.
Clear nothing on bottom.
It is chemical reaction.
Mixtures 4 and 5 are saturate because there is material on bottom.
Solution 4 and solution 5. The cup has material on the bottom.
4 and 5 are saturated because there is material on the bottom that will not dissolve.
Solution 4, 5. Saturation is when you can see some material on the bottom.
4 and 5 because there is material on the bottom.
Mixture 4 and mixture 5 are saturated. When water cannot hold any more of a solid, when you try to add more, it falls to the bottom. That happened in both mixture 4 and 5 so they are both saturated.
I forgot what that means.
Mixture 4 and mixture 5. It is when particles is sitting at the bottom.
Mixture 4 and 5 are both saturated because they have material on the bottom.
Mixture one, 2, and 3 because they are clean on the bottom.
4 and 5 because there stuff on the bottom.
Mixture 4 and 5 because there is no more space to dissolve so it is saturated.
4 and 5 are saturated because there is solid on the bottom.

Mixture 4 and 5 because there is material at the bottom.
4 and 5 because there is a solid at the bottom.
Cup 4 and 5 they are the material at the bottom so they are saturated.
Mixtures 4 and 5, the evidence is that there is material at the bottom and that means it is saturated.
